SEARCH
Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.design

Class ModuleInstance

java.lang.Object
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.design.ModuleInstance
public class ModuleInstance extends Object
There is no direct representation of a module instance in XDL. Each member of a module instance is referenced in a particular way back to the module instance. This class attempts to collect all the module instance information into a single class.
Author:
Chris Lavin Created on: Jun 22, 2010

  • Constructor Details

    • ModuleInstance

      public ModuleInstance(String name, Design design)
      Constructor initializing instance module name
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the module instance

    • ModuleInstance

      public ModuleInstance(ModuleInstance moduleInstance)
      This will initialize this module instance to the same attributes as the module instance passed in. This is primarily used for classes which extend ModuleInstance.
      Parameters:
      moduleInstance - The module instance to mimic.

      Returns:

    • isPlaced

      public boolean isPlaced()

    • getAllValidPlacements

      public ArrayList<PrimitiveSite> getAllValidPlacements()
      Does a brute force search to find all valid locations of where this module instance can be placed. It returns the module instance to its original location.
      Returns:
      A list of valid anchor sites for the module instance to be placed.

    • place

      public boolean place(PrimitiveSite newAnchorSite, Device dev)
      Places the module instance anchor at the newAnchorSite as well as all other instances and nets within the module instance at their relative offsets of the new site.
      Parameters:
      newAnchorSite - The new site for the anchor of the module instance.
      dev - The device on which the module instance is being placed.
      Returns:
      True if placement was successful, false otherwise.

    • unplace

      public void unplace()
      Removes all placement information and unroutes all nets of the module instance.

    • getCorrespondingTile

      public Tile getCorrespondingTile(Tile templateTile, Tile newAnchorTile, Device dev)
      This method will calculate and return the corresponding tile of a module instance. for a new anchor location.
      Parameters:
      templateTile - The tile in the module which acts as a template.
      newAnchorTile - This is the tile of the new anchor instance of the module instance.
      dev - The device which corresponds to this module instance.
      Returns:
      The new tile of the module instance which corresponds to the templateTile, or null if none exists.
